ruleSearch.author: class.cnt.0@tag.p.1@tag.a.0@text||class.author@text
ruleSearch.lastChapter:
@css:p:matches(最近更新)@text||.chapter@text
@js:result.includes('最近更新') ? result.replace(/最近更新：(\d+-\d+-\d+).*\/(.*)/,'$2（$1）') : result
ruleSearch.name: class.cnt.0@class.tit.0@tag.a.0@text||class.name@tag.a@text
